title: Tyrannosaur
actors: Peter Mullan, Archie Lal, Jag Sanghera, Mike Fearnley
plot: The story of Joseph, a man plagued by violence and a rage that is driving him to self-destruction. As Joseph's life spirals into turmoil, a chance at redemption appears in the form of Hannah, a Christian charity shop worker. Their relationship develops to reveal that Hannah is hiding a secret of her own with devastating consequences to both of their lives.
awards: Won 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 19 wins & 21 nominations.
